description: This file defines several data models related to authentication and user roles, including TokenResponse, UserRole, and UserRead. It also includes a utility function for decoding JWT role hints.

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Represents an authentication token response containing access token and type.

classes.name: UserRole
classes.description: Represents a user role with id and name.

classes.name: UserRead
classes.description: Represents a minimal user model for frontend usage, including roles and status flags.

methods.name: TokenResponse.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a TokenResponse object from a JSON map.

methods.name: TokenResponse.toJson
methods.description: Converts a TokenResponse object back to a JSON map.

methods.name: UserRole.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a UserRole object from JSON.

methods.name: UserRead.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a UserRead object from JSON, parsing roles list.

methods.name: decodeJwtRoleHint
methods.description: Decodes roles from a JWT token string, attempting to extract role hints.
